document_data.name: ''Helm of Torm's Sight''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Helm of Torm's Sight''''' was a powerful [[magic]]al [[helmet|helm]] that granted the wearer the ability to ''[[commune]]'' with [[Torm]], the God of Duty.
document_data.Description: For some time, it was kept safe within the grand cemetery in the holy city of [[Elturel]].
document_data.History:
At some point, Torm himself presented the helm to one of his most loyal [[paladin]]s, [[Lannish Fogel]] of Elturel.

In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the city of Elturel was [[Elturel#The Descent|brought down]] to the plane of [[Avernus]] in the [[Nine Hells]]. During the crisis, [[Grand Duke]] [[Ulder Ravengard]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] became trapped in the city with his retinue of guards. He sought out the ''Helm of Torm's Sight'' to gain an upper hand in the situation, but they were thwarted by warring [[devil]]s and [[demon]]s.
